info.name: Re-enable the horizontal scrollbar
info.description:
When you setup a layout with too many columns, or when accessing from a low resolution device or browser window resized to be thinner, the contents Live Coin Watch may go beyond what you can see, but for some reason the horizontal scrollbar is disabled by default. This style fixes that.



keywords livecoinwatch, live coin watch, https://www.livecoinwatch.com/ , livecoinwatch.com
